languages.text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.
languages.original_text: За тысячи лет Империум закостенел в своей непримиримой ненависти ко всему, что бросает вызов его законам и верованиям. Любой, кто пытается идти против этой узаконенной ненависти, рискует собственной жизнью.

traits.locale_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. An Imperial subject who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. An Imperial subject who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. An Imperial subject who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.
The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

languages.text: За тысячи лет Империум закостенел в своей непримиримой ненависти ко всему, что бросает вызов его законам и верованиям. Любой, кто пытается идти против этой узаконенной ненависти, рискует собственной жизнью.

traits.locale_text: За тысячи лет Империум закостенел в своей непримирой ненависти ко всему, что бросает вызов его законам и верованиям. Любой, кто пытается идти против этой узаконенной ненависти, рискует собственной жизнью.

languages.text: Die unerschütterliche Feindseligkeit des Imperiums gegenüber allem, was seine Gesetze und Dogmen bedroht, hat sich über Tausende von Jahren verfestigt. Jeder, der diesem heiligen Hass entsagt, riskiert sein Leben.
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

traits.locale_text: Die unerschütterliche Feindseligkeit des Imperiums gegenüber allem, was seine Gesetze und Dogmen bedroht, hat sich über Tausende von Jahren verfestigt. Ein imperialer Untertan, der diesem heiligen Hass entsagt, riskiert sein Leben.

languages.text: 数千年来，帝国对一切胆敢挑战帝国法律与教条的事物都怀着坚定不移的敌意。无论什么人，只要胆敢偏离律法规定的仇恨，便会面临生命危险。
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

traits.locale_text: 数千年来，帝国对一切胆敢挑战帝国法律与教条的事物都怀着坚定不移的敌意。无论什么人，只要胆敢偏离律法规定的仇恨，便会面临生命危险。

languages.text: L'hostilité inébranlable de l'Imperium à l'égard de tout ce qui est susceptible de menacer ses lois et ses dogmes s'est calcifiée au fil des millénaires. Toute personne qui s'écarte de la ligne de cette haine officielle risque d'y perdre la vie.
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

traits.locale_text: Cliquez à deux reprises sur le portrait d'un personnage pour centrer la caméra sur ce dernier.
Cliquez à deux reprises sur le portrait d'un personnage pour centrer la caméra sur ce dernier.

L'hostilité inébranlable de l'Imperium à l'égard de tout ce qui est susceptible de menacer ses lois et ses dogmes s'est calcifiée au fil des millénaires. Tout sujet impérial qui s'écarte de la ligne de cette haine officielle risque d'y perdre la vie.

languages.text: La hostilidad incansable del Imperium hacia todo lo que desafíe sus leyes y dogmas se ha anquilosado con el paso de los milenios. Cualquiera que deje este odio a un lado pone su vida en peligro.
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

traits.locale_text: La hostilidad incansable del Imperium hacia todo lo que desafíe sus leyes y dogmas se ha anquilosado con el paso de los milenios. Todo súbdito imperial que deje este odio a un lado pone su vida en peligro.

languages.text: 帝国は、その法律や教義に異議を唱えるものに対して確固たる敵意を持つ。この公認された憎悪から逸脱する帝国臣民は、命の危険にさらされる。
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.

traits.locale_text: 帝国は、その法律や教義に異議を唱えるものに対して確固たる敵意を持つ。この公認された憎悪から逸脱する帝国臣民は、命の危険にさらされる。

languages.text: İmparatorluğun yasalarına ve dogmalarına meydan okuyan her şeye karşı olan düşmanlığı, binlerce yıl boyunca büyüyerek kaskatı bir hâl almıştır. Meşrulaşmış bu nefret yolundan sapmaya kalkan herkes, canını riske atar.
languages.original_text: The Imperium's unswerving hostility toward anything that challenges its laws and dogma has calcified over thousands of years. Anyone who deviates from this sanctioned hatred risks their very life.
